Articles.Content:
I was here for a while, then I accidentally entered the wrong Steam username while trying to transfer my KSP to steam. After trying to contact the customer service to no avail, I stopped playing for a few months. Finally caved in and bought another copy from steam, but still that sucked. Now I'll be missing on future DLC, but eh, whatever :/

I also noticed that the forums have been reset. I suppose I should reopen the workshop.

My favourite ships are SSTOs. I've been trying to make one big enough to tow space station parts into orbit, but it has proved to be rather difficult so far aside from the smaller modules.

Here's a sample of my work:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

comes with 4 docking ports, 2 to each side spaced using a bicoupler. Allows for strong, wobble-free docks and cool looks.

Edited July 8, 2013 by littlebattler
Email customer service again. My move to steam failed first time too.
I did email them again. No response at all.
